cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BSITAMKXO MAJESTY^ GOVEBIMBNT)a E C R E 0?. CP, 116 (25).C A 3 I M E T.POLITICAL LEVIES BILL COMMITTEE. fReference Cabinet 9(25), Conclusion 15).At the Second Meeting of the above Committee., held at the India Office this morning, the Committee agreed that its findings, which were unanimously reached, should be reported to the Cabinet verbally by the Chairman (The Secretary of State for India).(Signed) T. JONES.Secretary to the Committee,2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.I., February 26th, 1925,
